entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:22 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -40.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -40.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -60
Dewpoint: -45.1°C
Wind: N 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 37 by morning. Wind chill minus 60 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
